meanings.sent1: The nictitant cat blinked slowly in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She had a nictitant reflex when something flew close to her eye.
meanings.sent3: The nictitant owl winked at the moon, trying to impress it.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed nictitant in the dark sky, as if blinking at each other.
meanings.sent5: His nictitant eyelids fluttered with exhaustion after a long day.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to wink or blink
meanings.sent1: The robot had nictitant sensors to detect movement.
meanings.sent2: The baby had nictitant eyes that blinked rapidly in curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The nictitant camera captured every blink of the model on the runway.
meanings.sent4: The nictitant fireflies lit up the night with their blinking dance.
meanings.sent5: Her nictitant eyelashes fluttered like delicate wings as she blinked.
